name: Breakout Freakout
description:
Breakout Freakout is a 2D game where you must control a paddle at the bottom of the screen to bounce a ball to hit bricks and score as many points as possible without it falling off the screen. Every time all the grey bricks are destroyed in a level the next level will appear, replacing all the bricks with slightly harder bricks that may contain new types.

Controls:

Left & Right arrow keys to move the paddle

W & D to rotate the paddle

R to reset all the balls to just 1 in the middle, but costs 1 life. This is useful if the ball gets stuck.
